name: Foam Rolling and Massage
description: Using self-myofascial release techniques to reduce muscle tension and improve recovery.

cards.title: Foam Rolling for Quadriceps
cards.description: Releasing tension and improving blood flow in the quads.
bulletpoints: Position the foam roller under the thighs
Roll slowly from hips to knees, pausing on tight spots
Apply moderate pressure to release adhesions
cards.summaryText: Glide over quads slowly and camp on knots to flush tension out.

cards.title: Upper Back Foam Rolling for Posture Correction
cards.description: Reducing tension in the upper back and improving thoracic mobility.
bulletpoints: Place the foam roller under the upper back
Gently roll from the mid-back to shoulders
Avoid rolling directly on the lower back
cards.summaryText: Open up the upper back with gentle rolls that prime better posture.
